data.text:
Jim Hall:

In Jack London's White Fang, Jim Hall is a character that appears in the final part of the book. He is an escaped convict who has sworn vengeance against Judge Scott, the father of Weedon Scott.

Answer and Explanation:

White Fang and Jim Hall are similar in the book White Fang in that they were both mistreated in life and developed a deep hatred and mistrust of...
